marvel.description: A scientist at Beemont Manufacturing, Jalome Beacher created a chemical that could be used to coat a surface and thereby eliminate all friction between it and any other object, which he used, after being downsized, to rob banks and his former employers.

name: Slyde
powersText: Wears chemical laced suit that grants:
Ability to move at superhuman speeds
Ability to easily escape from a grappling hold
